column5: maybe mine was just a fluke but i was verrry disappointed. This dish comes in a jar and upon opening
column6: there is a cloud of smoke. after the oohing and aahing the smell really got to me. it was too herby.. my olfactory receptors were becoming desensitized! okay
column7: now on to the taste... there were maybe 4 or 5 pieces of duck
column8: which were incredibly dry. they seemed on the verge of becoming duck jerky if they had been smoked any longer. I had one bite and forced my bf to finish the rest.
